#summary Public upload plugin

= Introduction =

Public upload plugin is built-in plugin that provides possibility to send a upload link to anyone. Files uploaded will be saved in the folder where the link was generated from.

= Configuration =

Public upload plugin does not have any parameters. Configure plugin by adding following into configuration.php (or merge into existing plugins array):

{{{
	$PLUGINS = array(
		"PublicUpload" => array()
	);
}}}
